page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: ARABLE FARMING Bendish Farm is situated between Whitwell and Bendish but is nearer Bendish.Bendish Farm is owned by Sir Thomas Pilkington but is managed by Mr.J.Daniels.It is a 600 acre farm,500 of the acres are under tillage,with 14 acres derelict land.60 acres intensively managed grassland,15 acres enclosed rough grazing,10 acres dominantly conifers ,10 acres dominantly deciduous trees. The farm is an arable farm (no livestock).The best crop last year was peas.The crops are wheat,beans,oil seed rape,peas,oats and barley.Winter barley is the first crop harvested each year.
